channel.title: CVE Feed for MediaTek, Inc. -- MT2713, MT2715, MT8173, MT8188, MT8195, MT8390, MT8395
channel.description: The latest CVEs for MediaTek, Inc. -- MT2713, MT2715, MT8173, MT8188, MT8195, MT8390, MT8395

item.title: CVE-2024-20020|2024-08-01T21:52:31.578Z -- mediatek%2C%20inc. -- mt2713%2C%20mt2715%2C%20mt8173%2C%20mt8188%2C%20mt8195%2C%20mt8390%2C%20mt8395
item.description: In OPTEE, there is a possible out of bounds write due to an incorrect bounds check. This could lead to local information disclosure with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Patch ID: ALPS08522504; Issue ID: ALPS08522504.

item.description: In OPTEE, there is a possible out of bounds write due to an incorrect bounds check. This could lead to local information disclosure with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Patch ID: ALPS08522504; Issue ID: ALPS08522504.
